thread.title: World Indigenous Games get off to colorful, if rocky, start
thread.title_full: World Indigenous Games get off to colorful, if rocky, start

title: World Indigenous Games get off to colorful, if rocky, start
text: > International World Indigenous Games get off to colorful, if rocky, start Indigenous from various ethnic groups hold protest signs that read in Portuguese "Stop the Genocide," left, and "No to PEC 215," regarding the mapping of indigenous lands, during the opening ceremony of the World Indigenous Games in Palmas, Brazil, Friday, Oct. 23, 2015. Protesters criticize the multi-million dollars spending on the games, saying the money would be better spent on improving the conditions of Brazil's impoverished indigenous peoples. (AP Photo/Eraldo Peres)
